trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Weatherford
There were no other sightings in Weatherford on or around July 31st 1974
Summary: IT APPEARED AS A GREEN LIGHT IN THE DISTANCE TO THE NORTH. ABOUT 2 O'CLOCK ELEVATION. IT JUST SAT THERE. MY WIFE,MYSELF AND KIDS WERE SITTING IN THE DRIVEWAY LOOKING AT THE STARS AS WE HAD JUST MOVED FROM FT. WORTH TO THE COUNTRY. OUR OUTSIDE SECURITY
divs: Sighting DetailsLIGHT WAS TURNED OFF SO WE COULD SEE THE STARS BETTER. I HAD ONE OF THOSE FLASHLIGHTS THAT USES A LARGE SQUARE BATTERY. I POINTED IT AT THE LIGHT AND BLINKED IT THREE TIMES. TO MY AMAZEMENT IT BLINKED BACK THREE TIMES. SO I DID IT AGAIN WITH THE SAME RESULTS. MY WIFE ALSO SAW THIS. I DON'T KNOW HOW MUCH TIME HAD PASSED BUT WHEN I LOOKED AGAIN IT WAS GONE. DURING THE WHOLE TIME OF OBSERVATION, IT STAYED IN THE SAME SPOT.
